item.title: Chocolate Chip Ice Cream
item.description: Makes about 2 quarts. 2 vanilla beans or 4 teaspoons vanilla extract 3.5 cups heavy cream 2.5 cups whole milk 0.66 cups sugar 0.66 cups light corn syrup 0.5 teaspoons salt 12 large egg yolks 0.25 cups of bittersweet chocolate 1 teaspoon of vegetable oil Cut vanilla beans in half lengthwise. Scrape out seeds. Combine vanilla beans, seeds, cream, milk, sugar, corn syrup, and salt in double boiler. Heat, stirring occassionally, until mixture is steaming steadily, 5-10 minutes, 175 F.
